keyPolicies.policyDescription: A plan to rebuild and transform communities, putting billions back into public services.
Creation of over a million good jobs across the country.
Additional funding for the NHS to the tune of over £150 billion.
Creating a National Care Service and providing additional funding for social care.
Taking on the climate crisis with a Green Industrial Revolution.
Negotiate a better Brexit deal and put it to a public vote.

issues.brexitEurope: Negotiate a better Brexit deal and put it to a public vote.
issues.economy: Putting billions back into public services, creating jobs, and funding for social care.
issues.environment: A Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate crisis.
issues.health: Over £150 billion in additional funding for NHS, creating a National Care Service.
issues.socialWelfare: Providing additional funding for social care and creating a National Care Service.

images.caption: The Future of our country is at stake.
